title: Stunning new 2 bedroom, 2bath apartment in Atlanta
posting_body: 250sqft large room with a walk-in closet available for rent in Atlanta.
You would have access to a shared kitchen, laundry, dining, living and sunroom.
Off street parking with built-in basketball hoop.
The house sits on a ⅓ acre of land.
The ideal tenant would be mid 20’s to early 30’s, professional, clean, laid back person.
The room is $849 + ¼ utilities (water, gas, electric).
Ultra high speed internet, netflix, and Amazon Prime included.
An unfinished basement with abundant storage.
A driveway with space for two cars.
And a bonus shed in the back yard that can be used as an office or for additional storage.
Freshly painted and new roof just installed.
If you interested please contact me :- kristi51523@𝐆𝐦𝐚𝐢𝐥com
